title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package' occurs when selecting xxx as destination in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3. When this bug occurs, the resulting xx package contains a package named 'ui'.
OB: When selecting xxx as the destination package in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3, the resulting package xx contains an additional package named 'ui'.
EB: The 'copy package' function should not create an additional 'ui' package within the xx package.
SR: To reproduce the bug: 1. Open org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3. 2. Select xxx as the destination package. 3. Perform the 'copy package' action.
